head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SILBERG, DR. ARNOLD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SILBERG, DR. ARNOLD

block.p: SILBERG-Dr. Arnold. Of Weehawken, NJ, on October 13, 2000. Beloved husband of Lillian L. Devoted father of Bruce Silberg, Jay and Ruth Silberg. Loving grandfather of Eric, Karen and Joanne. Services will be held at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery, Brooklyn, NY, on Monday October 16, 2000 at 2 PM. For information call ''GuttermanMusicant'', 800-522-0588.
